name: Lipstick Under My Burkha
review:
A poor script where all the good actors are wasted. There was a good thought running regarding this theme but didn't come well at all.

Storyline Rating: 2

Acting Rating: 2
Aahana Kumra: 2
Ratna Pathak Shah: 2
Konkona Sen Sharma: 2
Shashank Arora: 2

Direction Rating: 2

Music Rating: 2

Cinematography: 2

Editing: 2
